name: Moaiban
description:
BACKGROUND

I made this game to go along with a project in 8th grade on Easter Island. Instead of making a diorama or something like else, I wanted to combine my hobby and my education. I got it approved by my teacher and I went through with it. I also submitted it for a Spring game contest, which required my game to have a story.

I made all the graphics and music. Most of it sounds and looks terrible! This was my first time making a 3D game in Game Maker.

It comes with a level editor and an unnecessary scoring system.

ORIGINAL DESCRIPTION

A puzzle game like sokoban that you have to push all the blocks onto spaces. I made Moaiban, an Easter Island themed game. The ancient islanders made giant stone statues called Moai and pushes them up onto platforms called Ahu. I thought it would be cool to combine these ideas. Has 60 levels, a level editor, and can save up to 10 slots!
